Articles.Content:
So, I guess I might as well introduce myself. I'm not going to say my real name (weird, right?), but I live in the US, I love KSP and, well, video games in general. Well, I'm not quite new to the game, I've been playing since 0.19, but I'm new to the forums. I'll be taking mission ideas (As I have absolutely none atm), but I just wanted to introduce myself real quick.'

Cheers!

Welcome to the forums!

Things are a bit unusual around here with the release of 1.0 imminent.

Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Welcome! Ignore the frenzied masses, just stay excited for tomorrow! It'll be a whole different world...

Hype train aside, welcome to the forums. I've been playing since .7 myself, so I've seen a lot...

My favorite missions are building space stations in orbit around every planetary body and keeping them supplied... 

Funny, I haven't completed even half the planets yet... Modding seems to get in the way of gaming time lately
